content.rendered:
The only 5 star resort in the east.

Enjoy All the Natural Beauty

explore more
Guests
Adult 0
Children 0

748k

satisfied customers
01
the resort

Experience serenity and luxury retreats

Welcome to our oasis of luxury and tranquility, where every aspect of your experience is meticulously crafted to exceed your expectations. Our resort is a perfect combination of distinctly designed rooms in a setting of rare natural beauty which only Samui has to offer.

explore more
Seaside location in the exclusive island resort
Luxury family rooms and suites
Wide range of top restaurants and bars
Spa & wellness for everyone
02
explore

Make every moment memorable

The stay at Wellness & Spa Hotel means enjoying every moment. Relax. Find inspiration. Be fascinated.

001
Romantic getaway

Step into a world of leisure and fun hidden in a beautiful beachfront resort.

002
Family vacation

Step into a world of leisure and fun hidden in a beautiful beachfront resort.

003
Peaceful retreat

Step into a world of leisure and fun hidden in a beautiful beachfront resort.

004
Special events

Step into a world of leisure and fun hidden in a beautiful beachfront resort.

03
rooms & suites

The ultimate resort accommodations

view all rooms

1-2 person
2 beds
04
wellness & spa

Extensive wellness, thermal spring, team of therapists

A breathtaking spa with Indian Ocean blue stretching across the horizon.
Mind and body healing through the embrace of calming seawater
Let the rhythm of the waves guide your breath.
Experience tranquility as time gently slips away at Spa.
A rejuvenating retreat where time stands still.
05
guest review

What customers
have to say

“We arrived early and we couldn't check but were exhausted. As soon as a room was cleaned and ready we were checked in at 10:30 not 3pm. This was extremely good service from the staff.”
Annie Hebert Review from TripAdvisor
“The staff at breakfast were helpful and friendly. Nothing was too much trouble. The outside seating area was sheltered and sunny, perfect for relaxing after a long flight. The shuttle service was efficient and easy to access”
conie corleone Review from TripAdvisor
“Very clean and comfy stay. Very friendly staff, great shuttle service. Hotel is super close to the terminal. Would definitely recommend this hotel.”
jonny fontane Review from TripAdvisor
06
news & events
